ValidationRule.description: Valid billing countries are: Australia, Guam, Malaysia, New Zealand, Saipan, Singapore
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($User.Id !='00570000001tweu',AND( RecordType.Name == 'EMAP Fuel Accounts', NOT(ISBLANK( BillingState )), (BillingCountry <> "Australia"), (BillingCountry <> "Guam"), (BillingCountry <> "Malaysia"), (BillingCountry <> "New Zealand"), (BillingCountry <> "Saipan"), (BillingCountry <> "Singapore") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have entered wrong Billing Country. Please enter correct Billing country. Valid billing countries are: Australia, Guam, Malaysia, New Zealand, Saipan, Singapore
